triggers.trigger:
spriteProperty,char,x<850 spriteProperty,char,y>2800
@! What's that sound? Is that a voice?

action.name: Teleport
action.args: @! It's not that you aren't allowed to go here, it's just that social norms would indicate it is rude to go through someone else's property.

action.name: Open.
action.args: chest1,trollTab, @! You got TROLL TAB! @! This stuff is a thicker, slimier consistency than the human TAB. It would normally keep colder for longer too, if this were actually kept in a fridge and not haphazardly thrown in a chest. Either way, it doesn't taste any better.

action.name: Open.
action.args: chest2,khaled, @! You got a PUZZLE CUBE! @! This thing is a clusterfuck if you've ever seen one. What's with the gears and clockfaces? You guess Dave must have alchemized this, but realized it was probably far too ridiculously complicated to actually use for entertainment.

action.name: Open.
action.args: chest3,oldsickle, @! You got an OLD SICKLE! @! Man. This was a sickle you used before you alchemized the prime weapon in your collection, the HOMES SMELL YA LATER. This was a bit prickly and rather uncomfortable to hold, and the color scheme leaves a lot to be desired. You're glad you've since upgraded.

action.name: Open.
action.args: chest4,bucket, @! You got a BUCKET! @! Gross. Who would leave this here? That doesn't seem very sanitary.

action.name: Open.
action.args: coffMach1,obj01, @! You got some COFFEE! @! Man, this is some cheap coffee. You’ve kept trying to drink coffee to keep you awake but usually it doesn’t wake you up at all. It just multiplies your inferiority complex and adds some anxious jittering. Never the less you occasionally still drink it to try to build tolerance. @! You still hang around the place as you drink it.

action.name: Examine.
action.args: @! So many titles you haven’t heard of. So many textbooks. That third shelf though... All romance novels. Hey, those two on the end! You were wondering where they went. Oh well, re-reading them isn’t really a priority right now.

action.name: Examine.
action.args: @! Roses are red. Those bottles are blue. Most your friends are dead. Get over it.

action.name: Examine.
action.args: @! You look at the iGrub to check what songs are on it. Maybe listening to something else will get this strange synthetic tune out of your head. @! You can't figure out the unlock code, though. Damn. There's got to be somewhere else to listen to music.

action.name: Examine.
action.args: @! It’s currently just a browser on dave/_ebubbles. You’re not looking through that shit. It’s terrible and reading its posts is an experience you would not reccomend to anyone, living or dead.

action.name: Talk to Dave.
Talk to Dave.
Talk to Dave.
Talk to Rose.
Talk to Kanaya.

action.args:
kanaya,
@karkat_talk KARKAT: SO WHAT'S UP WITH THAT HUGE HOLE YOU HAD? @kanaya_bored KANAYA: I Beg Your Pardon Karkat @karkat_talk KARKAT: WHAT? I'M JUST ASKING ABOUT THE HUGE GAPING- @kanata_bored KANAYA: Karkat Do Not Even Think Of Completing That Sentence @karkat_yell KARKAT: WOW, WHAT THE GRUBPASTE SLATHERED FUCK IS YOUR PROBLEM? @kanaya_angrytalk KANAYA: I Am Wondering The Same About Why You Think Its Appropriate To Start Conversations Like That @karkat_shout KARKAT: WELL, OBVIOUSLY I GUESS A RABID SHITSQUIRREL CLIMBED UP IT OR SOMETHING, I GUESS THAT ANSWER'S MY QUESTION! THANK YOU! @kanaya_angrytalk KANAYA: What The Hell Has Gotten Into You All Of A Sudden @kanaya_angrytalk KANAYA: Is It The Coffee What Did I Tell You About Drinking Coffee Karkat @karkat_shout KARKAT: I'M JUST TRYING TO ASK A SIMPLE FUCKING QUESTION OUT OF GENERAL CONCERN. @kanaya_angrytalk KANAYA: That Is Not Something You Should Be Concerned About @kanaya_angrytalk KANAYA: This Is A Simple Concept And I Am Shocked That You Do Not Understand It There Are Subjects That You Should Not Ever Bring Up Publicly @kanaya_angrytalk KANAYA: I Know Being Offensive Is Your Specialty But At Least Have Some Damned Common Sense @kanaya_bored KANAYA: I Want You To Apologize @karkat_sullen KARKAT: ... @karkat_sullen KARKAT: I'M SORRY I- @kanaya_angrytalk KANAYA: INSIDE VOICES KARKAT @karkat_sullen KARKAT: (i'm sorry i asked about your injury, i didn't know that was offensive to jadebloods-) @kanaya_idle KANAYA: ... @kanaya_idle KANAYA: Injury... @kanaya_smirktalk KANAYA: Oh @kanaya_smirklaugh KANAYA: Oh Okay @kanaya_smirklaugh KANAYA: Oh Dear God @kanaya_smirktalk KANAYA: I Did Not Think You Were Talking About My Injury @karkat_what KARKAT: WHAT? THEN- @karkat_horror KARKAT: ... @karkat_facepalm KARKAT: ... @karkat_shout KARKAT: NO NO NO OF FUCKING COURSE NOT WHAT THE HELL IS WRONG WITH YOU! @kanaya_smirktalk KANAYA: Let Us Just Forget This Conversation Ever Happened @kanaya_smirktalkKANAYA: Yes The Wound Is Nearly Gone Thank You For Asking @karkat_talk KARKAT: CAN I SEE? PULL UP YOUR SHIRT. @kanaya_angrytalk KANAYA: Karkat! @karkat_shout KARKAT: WHAT!

action.name: Ask Case for Credits.
